title: Workcover: a comprehensive video guide
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Legal services - Australia
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Courts - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Workers' compensation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Legal services - Australia
description: Andrew Ellis, solicitor, discusses the individual's rights to compensation for work related injuries. Topics include: the role of the solicitor; making a claim for compensation; lump sums for permanent disability; the role of the courts and dispute settlement. This program is intended as a starting point, not as a replacement for expert legal advice.
